com.lygit.rangebar

类 Bar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lygit.rangebar.Bar

  • public class Bar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the underlying gray bar in the RangeBar (without the thumbs).

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Bar(android.content.Context ctx, float x, float y, float length, int tickCount, float tickHeightDP, int tickColor, float barWeight, int barColor)
      Bar constructor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws the bar on the given Canvas.
      void drawTicks(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws the tick marks on the bar.
      float getLeftX()
      Get the x-coordinate of the left edge of the bar.
      float getNearestTickCoordinate(com.lygit.rangebar.PinView thumb)
      Gets the x-coordinate of the nearest tick to the given x-coordinate.
      int getNearestTickIndex(com.lygit.rangebar.PinView thumb)
      Gets the zero-based index of the nearest tick to the given thumb.
      float getRightX()
      Get the x-coordinate of the right edge of the bar.
      void setTickCount(int tickCount)
      Set the number of ticks that will appear in the RangeBar.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Bar

        public Bar(android.content.Context ctx,
           float x,
           float y,
           float length,
           int tickCount,
           float tickHeightDP,
           int tickColor,
           float barWeight,
           int barColor)
        Bar constructor
        参数:
        ctx - the context
        x - the start x co-ordinate
        y - the y co-ordinate
        length - the length of the bar in px
        tickCount - the number of ticks on the bar
        tickHeightDP - the height of each tick
        tickColor - the color of each tick
        barWeight - the weight of the bar
        barColor - the color of the bar

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws the bar on the given Canvas.
        参数:
        canvas - Canvas to draw on; should be the Canvas passed into {#link View#onDraw()}

      • getLeftX

        public float getLeftX()
        Get the x-coordinate of the left edge of the bar.
        返回:
        x-coordinate of the left edge of the bar

      • getRightX

        public float getRightX()
        Get the x-coordinate of the right edge of the bar.
        返回:
        x-coordinate of the right edge of the bar

      • getNearestTickCoordinate

        public float getNearestTickCoordinate(com.lygit.rangebar.PinView thumb)
        Gets the x-coordinate of the nearest tick to the given x-coordinate.
        参数:
        thumb - the thumb to find the nearest tick for
        返回:
        the x-coordinate of the nearest tick

      • getNearestTickIndex

        public int getNearestTickIndex(com.lygit.rangebar.PinView thumb)
        Gets the zero-based index of the nearest tick to the given thumb.
        参数:
        thumb - the Thumb to find the nearest tick for
        返回:
        the zero-based index of the nearest tick

      • setTickCount

        public void setTickCount(int tickCount)
        Set the number of ticks that will appear in the RangeBar.
        参数:
        tickCount - the number of ticks

      • drawTicks

        public void drawTicks(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws the tick marks on the bar.
        参数:
        canvas - Canvas to draw on; should be the Canvas passed into {#link View#onDraw()}
